name: Tic Tac Toe 2 player games with Sly Kitties! PRO!
name_original: Tic Tac Toe 2 player games with Sly Kitties! PRO!
description:
New game from the guys that brought you popolar game 'Kitties! Merged cats get angry!"
Play Tic Tac Toe with your friends together with characters of "Kitties! Merged cats get angry!"

Featues:
- Endless Tic Tac Toe field - much more fun than classic 3x3 field!
- Develops your logic and strategic thinking!
- Everybody knows the rules of the game!
- Enough Kitties to make you smile!
- Nice music and sounds!
- Challenge your friends!
- Cute animation!
- NO ADS!
